title: Need help identifying font; similar to Agency FB
content:
Hello friends, I'd love if someone could help me identify the attached font. It seems similar to Agency FB, but clearly different in some areas, especially the 'R'.

Please let me know your thoughts, I'd greatly appreciate the help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [aprum.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017235905/http:/typophile.com/files/aprum.jpg) | 21.21 KB |
author: wizardofahhs

comments.content: It's real close to that one! A subtle differences, the 'M' most notably with it dipping to a sharp point in Mevada.
